meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Geoff Brousseau Jan Brown Osman Syed Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7752.

td.p: Geoff Brousseau, an epidemiologist from Centennial, Colorado
Jan Brown, an air traffic controller from Warwick, Rhode Island
Osman Syed, a student from Jamesville, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $33,333)

tr.td: THE ANCIENT GREEKS
I'LL BE THE JUDGE OF THAT
NOVEL TITLE CHARACTERS
NAME THE MOVIE SPORT
SHUT UP
TAKE MY MONEY!

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'The first event in history recorded by the ancient Greeks were these contests that took place in 776 B.C.')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: The first event in history recorded by the ancient Greeks were these contests that took place in 776 B.C.
